availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gabriel P. Dowell (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Cash Dowell. Father of Margaret Dowell and Ann Dowell. Married to Elizabeth E. Young Dowell in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in November 1852. Father of Young Burnett Dowell, Jefferson D. Dowell, and George F. Dowell. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Employed James Watson as a laborer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed Reuben Dowell as a farmhand in Princeton in 1860. Employed William Rich as a farmhand in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
